name: Crazy Hairy Faces Spa and Salon - Hair barber stylist and Hair cut game
name_original: Crazy Hairy Faces Spa and Salon - Hair barber stylist and Hair cut game
description:
This is an exciting fashion game for crazy kids. Here are a few crazy characters with excessive hair on their faces and are looking for your help to get tidy and clean. Remove the hair from their faces using the tools available and make them look good and smart. So download it now for free and give those characters an interesting and decent makeover!!!

HOW TO PLAY:
======================
• Select the character of your choice
• Use the tools to remove hair from the face
• Help them get tidy and clean using various other tools like (tweezer, hair brush, mouth freshner, shaver and wax etc.)
• Apply the same to all the characters

FEATURES:
======================
• Easy tap and drag game play.
• Kids friendly content
• Backgrounds and wallpaper personalization
• Sharing on Facebook with friends & family
• Suitable for the whole family
• Cool BG music and HD graphics
